# Assert

> Standard library basic mathematical assertion utilities.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var ns = require( '@stdlib/math/base/assert' );
```

#### ns

Standard library basic mathematical assertion utilities.

``` javascript
var o = ns;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
